        public void start()
        Method: Start ------------- This method starts a server on the given port. It is hard coded to handle img requests and resource requests specially by just reading the files and returning them. All other requests should be handled by the users code.

      • renderTemplate

        public static String renderTemplate(String templatePath,
                                    Map<String,String> args)
        Method: Render Template ----------------------- OPTIONAL: This method takes in a template (currently it takes the path to a template) and provides functionality for (a) importing other slivers of HTML and (b) inserting values from a map into all places in the template with the sequence {{key}}. See resources/index.html for an example.
